Coconut_Creek.Pompano Beach Mound:
The Pompano Beach Mound, located at Indian Mound Park in Pompano Beach, Florida in Broward County, is a 100 feet (30 m) wide, 7 feet (2.1 m) tall oval Tequesta burial mound. It is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.


== History ==
The mound sits at the southeast edge of Pompano Beach on the western shore of a long narrow Atlantic coast barrier island.
